channel.title: Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe
channel.description:
So yeah the title says it all. When i try to run my client, i get that error. I have a Jframe.java. Im running java jdk1.8.0_11, if that has any relevance. Not sure what to do. Would really appreciate any help. Here's my run code: [code]@echo off title "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 Pause[/code]
Edit: So i figured it out, needed to add -cp . after java. So if anyone else has this problem here's what it looks like now [code]@echo off title "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin\java.exe" -cp . -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 Pause[/code]

item.title: Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe
item.dc:creator: @Malachai Malachai
item.description:
@Malachai wrote:

So yeah the title says it all. When i try to run my client, i get that error. I have a Jframe.java. Im running java jdk1.8.0_11, if that has any relevance. Not sure what to do. Would really appreciate any help. Here’s my run code:

@echo off title "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 Pause

Edit: So i figured it out, needed to add -cp . after java. So if anyone else has this problem here’s what it looks like now

@echo off title "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin\java.exe" -cp . -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 Pause
